Preliminary total snow accumulations in the mountains of 10 to 14 inches, while 5 to 10 inches in the lower elevations. Very windy in the mountains could result in whiteout conditions.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley
